title: Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War Officially Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.27.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War finally being revealed.

KFGD082720
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:20 - Housekeeping
Today, there’s no post show BECAUSE right after KFGD is Gamescom Opening Night Live. We’re reacting to it live right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames so stay tuned and join the Reacts Crew to see what Geoff Keighley has in store.
THEN, stick around after as we record a Kinda Funny Gamescast Gamescom Post Show which you can catch live right here or later everywhere else as usual.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:55 - Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War has been officially Revealed - Jonathon Dornbush @ IGN
00:23:25 - Fortnite’s Newest season has been revealed - Jonathon Dornbush @ IGN
00:27:00 - Do you think this means Warzone will live on instead of being replaced like Blackout? How long does it last and how do they keep it fresh when new mainline games drop? - Best Friends Q:
00:30:35 - Our biggest questions about Gotham Knights have been answered thanks to IGN - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:35:05 - PS5 Pre-Orders AREN’T Available, but that won’t stop Sony from selling it to you - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:43:50 - Microsoft Brings Back Halo Veteran to get the game back on track - Dina Bass and Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
00:45:20 - Resident Evil TV series is coming to Netflix - Lesley Goldberg @ Hollywood Reporter
00:41:10 -  KLARNA 
00:42:08 -  Bespoke Post
00:50:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Imran
